member.name: STORAGE_ACCESS_ALIGNMENT_DESCRIPTOR
member.summary: Used in conjunction with theIOCTL_STORAGE_QUERY_PROPERTY control code to retrieve the storage access alignment descriptor data for a device.

member.name: STORAGE_ACCESS_ALIGNMENT_DESCRIPTOR.Version
member.summary: Contains the size of this structure, in bytes. The value of this member will change as members are added to the structure.

member.name: STORAGE_ACCESS_ALIGNMENT_DESCRIPTOR.Size
member.summary: Specifies the total size of the data returned, in bytes. This may include data that follows this structure.

member.name: STORAGE_ACCESS_ALIGNMENT_DESCRIPTOR.BytesPerCacheLine
member.summary: The number of bytes in a cache line of the device.

member.name: STORAGE_ACCESS_ALIGNMENT_DESCRIPTOR.BytesOffsetForCacheAlignment
member.summary: The address offset necessary for proper cache access alignment, in bytes.

member.name: STORAGE_ACCESS_ALIGNMENT_DESCRIPTOR.BytesPerLogicalSector
member.summary: The number of bytes in a logical sector of the device.

member.name: STORAGE_ACCESS_ALIGNMENT_DESCRIPTOR.BytesPerPhysicalSector
member.summary: The number of bytes in a physical sector of the device.

summary.para: The logical sector offset within the first physical sector where the first logical sector is placed, in bytes.
